Name: RECEIPT
Description: Table of operations that have been performed to go from native data to L2 (Table)

Name: DRP_CONFIG
Description: Pipeline details (settings etc) to go from native data to L2 (Table)

Name: BARYCORR_KMS
Description: barycentric correction in km/s (can be a single value; array of Norder; or array of Nord x M pix)

Name: BARYCORR_Z
Description: barycentric correction in redshift (same as above)

Name: BJD_TDB
Description: photon weighted midpoint following the same structure as the barycentric HDU)

Name: DRIFT
Description: drift measurement in delta lambda with some structure as barycorr HDU (as defined by the instrument team)

Name: TELEMETRY
Description: table with 4 columns: time stamp; sensor name; value; units

Name: TRACE1_TELLURIC
Description: telluric model in same form as the TRACEX_FLUX HDU (generally used for Science traces)

Name: ANCILLARY_SPECTRUM
Description: Set of extensions that store additional spectra (e.g. H&K) that arenâ€™t in the primary spectrum

Name: IMAGE
Description: set of extensions that store useful support images used for quality control (guider cams; sky monitoring; pupil image)
